瓫字的基本解释

瓫
pén
古同“盆”：“毁其瓫，悉埋于地。”
古通“湓”，水溢出：“水滞瓫溢，大为灾害。”
重浊的声气。
姓。

瓫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pén］
［《集韻》蒲奔切，平魂，並。］
(1)同“盆”。敞口敛底的容器。
(2)通“湓”。水向上涌。参见“瓫溢”。

瓫字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【瓦字部】　瓫； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页748第10
【集韻】步奔切，與盆同。盎也。　又與湓同。水溢也。【前漢·溝洫志】河水湓溢。【晉書·食貨志】水澇瓫溢。

瓫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
瓫字的起名意思

暂无。

瓫
Basic explanation of words
瓫
pén
Gu Tong's "basin": "Destroy its chrysanthemum and bury it in the ground."
Gutong "Han", water overflows: "Water stagnates and overflows, and it is a big disaster."
Heavy voice.
name.
瓫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pén］
["Ji Yun" Pu Benqie, Ping Hun, and. ]
(1) Same as "basin". A container with an open mouth and a bottom.
(2) Through "湓". The water surged upwards. See "Overflow".
瓫
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Wu Ji 1] [Wa Zi Department] 　瓫; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 748 10
【Jiyun】Cut step by step, same as basin. Ang also.　Same as Han again. The water overflows too. [Previous Han·Gou Xia Zhi] The river overflowed. [Book of Jin·Shihuo Zhi] Waterlogged overflowing.
瓫
